entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
